statements: SELECT * FROM PurchasingData;
SELECT SupplierName, SUM(PurchaseAmount) AS TotalPurchaseAmount FROM PurchasingData GROUP BY SupplierName;
SELECT * FROM PurchasingData WHERE Quantity > 10;
SELECT ProductName, PurchaseAmount, PurchaseDate FROM PurchasingData ORDER BY PurchaseDate DESC;
SELECT SupplierName, COUNT(ProductName) AS ProductCount FROM PurchasingData GROUP BY SupplierName HAVING COUNT(ProductName) > 1;
SELECT * FROM PurchasingData WHERE Quantity > 10 ORDER BY PurchaseDate DESC;
SELECT ProductName, PurchaseAmount FROM PurchasingData WHERE SupplierName = 'ABC Suppliers' AND Quantity > 5;
SELECT SupplierName, SUM(PurchaseAmount) AS TotalPurchaseAmount FROM PurchasingData GROUP BY SupplierName;
SELECT PurchaseDate, ProductName, PurchaseAmount FROM PurchasingData WHERE PurchaseAmount > 100 ORDER BY PurchaseDate ASC;
SELECT SupplierName, Quantity, SUM(PurchaseAmount) AS TotalPurchaseAmount FROM PurchasingData GROUP BY SupplierName, Quantity HAVING SUM(PurchaseAmount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Purchases WHERE item_name = 'Book';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT purchase_date, item_name, quantity FROM Purchases WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Purchases WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM Purchases WHERE item_name LIKE 'Apple%' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Purchases GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM Purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases >= 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT supplier_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE contract_start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND contract_end_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM contracts GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_contracts > 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN suppliers ON purchases.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT contract_id, supplier_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM contracts JOIN suppliers ON contracts.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY contract_end_date
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM suppliers JOIN purchases ON suppliers.supplier_id = purchases.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_purchases > 10
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT id, customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_id ASC
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT products.product_name, products.unit_price, suppliers.supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE end_date > '2021-12-31' AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT trends.trend_name, trends.trend_description FROM trends
